Test.sq line 10:12 - No column found with name _id
  05    trigger_1:
  06    CREATE TRIGGER trigger_1
  07    BEFORE INSERT ON test
  08    BEGIN
  09      UPDATE test
  10      SET _id = old._id;
                    ^^^^^^^
  11    END

Test.sq line 29:12 - No column found with name _id
  24    trigger_3:
  25    CREATE TRIGGER trigger_3
  26    INSTEAD OF DELETE ON test
  27    BEGIN
  28      UPDATE test
  29      SET _id = new._id;
                    ^^^^^^^
  30    END

Test.sq line 40:19 - Cannot find table or view old
  32    trigger_4:
  33    CREATE TRIGGER trigger_4
  34    AFTER DELETE ON test
  35    BEGIN
  36      WITH temp_table AS (
  37        VALUES (1, 2, 3)
  38      )
  39      SELECT *
  40      FROM temp_table, old;
                           ^^^
  41    END

3 errors
